title: 80th Birthday Shirt for Men - It Took Me 80 Years to Look This Good!
features: 1942 SHIRTS FOR MEN - With several color options to choose from and sizes ranging from Sm-5X, this shirt makes a great 81st birthday gift. Search "ShirtInvaders 80th Birthday" to see all available options.
NEED A DIFFERENT YEAR - All years are available, search "ShirtInvaders (year)" to see more options.

UNISEX FIT - Classic style fit that is very similar to a basic t-shirt. Some shrinkage may occur during washing/drying, so you may want to size up if you are not sure or in between sizes. Size chart is shown in the photo section to the left.
PRODUCT QUALITY - Custom printed using an eco-friendly plastisol or water based ink to ensure vibrant color and long lasting durability.
FAST PROCESSING - Orders ship within one business day and usually arrive much earlier than the expected delivery date range provided at checkout.
description: 1942 80th Birthday Gifts For Men - It Took Me 80 Years To Look This Good - This shirt is available in two style options, a men's classic fit tee or a tapered women's fit tee. Available sizes range from Sm-5X and we offer several color options to choose from. All orders are processed within one business day and usually arrive much earlier than expected. This design was created by ShirtInvaders and custom screen printed in our Texas production facility using only the highest quality materials. Printed with an eco-friendly, softened plastisol or water based ink to create a vibrant design that is also soft to the touch and very easy to wear. Not only is it easy to wear, but it will last too! This is not just another last minute, random birthday gift idea designed for single use... ShirtInvaders branded t-shirts are created to be worn. A 80th birthday gift idea that will be loved, appreciated and actually used! A great option for a unique birthday gift, Father’s Day gift, Mother's Day gift, Christmas gift or just an unexpected surprise… and with every year offered, this shirt would make a great gift for anyone. Our t-shirts work for any and all occasions. We have a large selection of dated or year specific designs and gifts to choose from with a variety of color options and sizes to fit everyone. ShirtInvaders brand designs are created with our unique vision, style, and attitude. We want to impress everyone with our quality, our creativity, our speed and our motivation... From our customers and competitors to our own designers and printers. We’re not just a t-shirt shop, we are a unique brand with a hunger for success, a motivation to impress and a drive to set new industry standards.
